data.title: 5.4p3 DX11 FPS Template Crash
data.body:
Reproduceable crash when entering "sys_spec 1" in console during the FPS template example level.
Tested with Vulkan and DX11.

Vulkan worked fine (some graphical issues with water)
DX11 crashed when entering the mentioned cvar in console, everytime.

data.title: Test
data.body: Test for Documentation purposes.

data.title: Asset Browser UX issues (5.4 Preview)
data.body:
- When you delete a folder and there are folders listed after that, Asset Browser clears the folder to delete from the list but doesn't rearrange the list, instead there's an empty space where folder used to exist (until you change the folder from left side list back and forth). What would be expected is to Asset Browser to refresh the list after deletion.

- When folder is selected and user hits delete key on keyboard, it doesn't do anything (would expect popup asking if you want to delete the folder)

- When folder is selected and users clicks on the name, rename functionality doesn't get enabled - like it would in windows explorer and other file managers.

data.title: !XE (GamePlugin) Missing code block added for registering user defined EntityComponents.
data.body:
There is an issue with registering user defined EntityComponents in Blank Project because of the missing code block in **GamePlugin**. Simply, they are not registered by the engine, even if they have the correct registration code blocks. This change adds the missing code block to GamePlugin for fixing that issue.

**Issue link:** https://github.com/CRYTEK/CRYENGINE/issues/235

data.title: Why not use Visual Studio for C# projects?
data.body:
Update for May 10, 2017: Xamarin Studio 6.3 is the final release of Xamarin Studio. We recommend that developers now use Visual Studio on both Windows and Mac. Visual Studio for Mac has all the features of Xamarin Studio, adds cloud and web development, and contains improvements for cross-platform mobile development.
From:https://developer.xamarin.com/releases/studio/xamarin.studio_6.3/xamarin.studio_6.3/

Why not change to Visual Studio?

data.title: create change to demo pull request
5.4 preview - r_HDRRendering=0 causes crash and level data corruption
data.body:
Consistently reproducable. I sent a crash report on the second try when my level was already corrupted. First time it happened editor asked if I wanted to save the level, I'm pretty sure I clicked NO but the level was corrupted when I started sandbox again.

Steps to reproduce:
- Open Sandbox
- Load level
- Ctrl+G to Start game
- Open console
- Enter r_HDRRendering=0

data.title: Crash using designer.
data.body:
Version 5.4 Preview 3.

When using the designer, if frequently undoing operations, occasionally the sandbox will crash.

Repeated twice today, going back to 5.3.

Editor log contains

<17:38:32> [Assert] Condition: str._header()->nRefCount != 0 [line 885] [File=D:\jk\gamesdk_release\Code\CryEngine\CryCommon\CryString/CryString.h]

data.title: Undo Keyboard [Ctrl-Z] shortcut not functional
data.body:
Version:   5.4 Preview 3.
In the sandbox I have to use the edit -> undo menu item in order to undo, the keyboard shortcut is not functional.

data.title: [5.4 Preview 3]: Blank Project Template's GamePlugin does not register user created EntityComponents
Env probe boundary not visible
data.body:
The new env probe(utilizing the new component system)'s boundary is not visible, making it hard to work with. 
The old env probe found in the misc components tab doesn't seem to work.

data.title: !FE (cry_cmake) Added a check for SDKs and user prompts
data.body:
!Added self destruction before generating solution to prevent user interacting with a frozen gui window
!Added missing sdk folder dialog prompt to allow the user to choose between: 1-Start the SDK Downloader exe, 2-Continue anyway, 3-Quit application.

+ This change also centers the created windows.

data.title: Material Editor not scaling for High DPI
data.body:
An issue in both 5.4 preview 2 and 5.3. It is very difficult to use and especially an issue when recording tutorial videos. 
![screenshot](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/962831/29100926-29d24734-7caf-11e7-9819-6f106f5385b0.PNG)

The issue can also be seen in the Facial Editor and slightly in the Mannequin Editor.

data.title: 5.4 Preview (1&2) can't generate new solution with VS2017
data.body:
5.3 solution generation works fine when you right click .cryproject file and select generate solution. With 5.4 using any of the stock template, generate solution throws the following error (with VS2017 Community Edition):
```
CMake Error in CMakeLists.txt:
Generator
  NMake Makefiles
does not support platform specification, but platform
  x64
was specified.

CMake Error: CMAKE_C_COMPILER not set, after EnableLanguage
CMake Error: CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER not set, after EnableLanguage
```
I've registered 5.4 preview by right clicking the cryengine.cryengine and selecting "Register engine" and by running <CE 5.4 dir>/Tools/CryVersionSelector/cryselect.exe install.

If I temporarily switch the 5.4 template project to use 5.3, I can generate the sln file (with errors) and then switch back to 5.4 (by right clicking .cryproject and select "Switch engine version"). After that I can regenerate 5.4 solution and it succeeds without any errors and I can compile the project just fine. 

It fails if there's no existing solution files, but works if there are the old ones. 

Also running the cmake manually from commandline works with the autogenerated CMakeLists.txt (that failed to run automatically):
`cmake CMakeLists.txt`

data.body:
when will there be an available port of cry engine to macos and linux?
cheers

data.title: 5.4 preview 2 Editor Crash Adding New Component
data.body:
If a component's ReflectType code makes a call to SetIcon with an invalid icon, it crashes the editor when adding a new component to an entity e.g.

`desc.SetIcon("icons:ObjectTypes/light-nnoooooo.ico");`

should crash the editor if you try and add a component to an existing entity.

data.body: CRYENGINE-5.3.4 version can connect HTC vive or CV1 but CRYENGINE-5.4.98_preview can't connect HTC VIVE or CV1 from game mode ?

data.title: Voxel
data.body:
You removed VOXEL and added CUBE EDITOR.
Return the VOXEL and put the CUBE EDITOR away.
VOXEL allows make cave and more in CE editor - Z-Brush make same cave, but i must adapt it long time!
I have to do a lot of recursive operations!!! VOXEL is fast and comfortable tool.
